amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the city of Banning, California, for renovations to the city-owned pool.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used for the city of Banning, California, for renovations to the city-owned pool.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 365 (Roll no. 277).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
